name: DiceWorld
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam in 2022

Controlls: WASD - to move, E to interact.

Prompts will disapear after interacting with them

Debug Controlls (Cheats): T to initiate a Turn, P to do a HighJump (works on the Ground and Midair), O to change to the Last Level, I to Close the Application, R to Respawn at a "safe" Place (you have to spam it sometimes)

Hints:

Side 1: Interact with the Stone

Side 2: Grab Water, then water the plant

Side 3: Grab Pickaxe then use it to smash Crate

Side 4: Interact with the Stones from small to large

Side 5: Go to the pedestal then to the previously sealed on Area

Inside the Cube: Stand Next to Dice with 6 on top, if that doesn't work, just press R

Art and Model, from the Unity Assetstore. Music is the Track "Two Moons" from Bobby Richards.

Extra: Probaly my Last Unity Game
